column5: Just spent a week fishing on Lac Seul with my Wife and two boys. It's our second year going to Canada and staying at Frog Rapids Camp, we really enjoy staying there. The fishing was excellent but the people really made the trip special. Got a lot of good advice and tips from many in camp on fishing spots and more importantly navigating LS. Especially glad bigwalleye1 stopped by our cabin this year and last. Package arrived here today, you sir are top notch! See you in camp next year.
Did you go through Pelican Falls to access Lac Seul or drive to Deception or Hudson Landing? What area on Lac Seul did you fish?
Agree - He's one of the "good guys".
Count on it. Glad the package arrived safely. Hopefully all goes well. Lots of folks you don't know are pulling for all of you.
scar, we put in at Deception and went as far north as Bear Narrows and west to Grassy Bay. We spent most of our time between Manitou light and Grassy Bay jigging with crawlers.
SMPOPS, I sent you a private message. Hope to hear back from you soon.
